io.wcm.qa.glnm.configuration

Class GaleniumConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.configuration.GaleniumConfiguration

  • public final class GaleniumConfiguration
extends Object
    Central place to integrate test run and environment configuration from Maven et al.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • getBaseUrl

        public static String getBaseUrl()
        The base URL to use when running tests. This is the URL called from the browsers when controlled by Selenium. You can add basic HTTP auth if needed for your SUTs.
        • Key: 
           io.wcm.qa.baseUrl
        • Default: 
           "http://localhost:4502"
        Returns:
        base URL with HTTP basic auth, if configured
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isLazyWebDriverInitialization

        public static boolean isLazyWebDriverInitialization()
        Lazy web driver intialization takes control away from WebDriverListener and lets the test itself decide when or whether to initialize a webdriver.
        • Key: 
           galenium.webdriver.lazy
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to use lazy web driver initialization
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isOnlyReportGalenErrors

        public static boolean isOnlyReportGalenErrors()
        Only report Galen errors and leave successful tests out of report. This drastically reduces the size of reports in the target folder. Useful to save disk space on CI.
        • Key: 
           galenium.report.galen.errorsOnly
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to skip reporting of successful tests
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isSamplingVerificationIgnore

        public static boolean isSamplingVerificationIgnore()
        Ignore sampling verification errors and continue running test. This is useful when generating initial samples.
        • Key: 
           galenium.sampling.verification.ignoreErrors
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to ignore errors when validating samples
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isSkipExtentReports

        public static boolean isSkipExtentReports()
        Usually Galenium will log to ExtentReports, but it can be skipped.
        • Key: 
           galenium.report.extent.skip
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether TestNG is used
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isSparseReporting

        public static boolean isSparseReporting()
        Sparse reporting is a different set of logging configuration. This allows to configure to different kinds of reporting for local development with more debugging needs and for CI which should give you a quick view of the important test steps and their results.
        • Key: 
           galenium.report.sparse
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to use sparse reporting on this run
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • isSuppressAutoAdjustBrowserSize

        public static boolean isSuppressAutoAdjustBrowserSize()
        Adjusting the browser size is important to ensure the correct viewport size, but it can lead to problems with certain browser/driver/OS combinations.
        • Key: 
           galenium.suppressAutoAdjustBrowserSize
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to skip automatic adjusting of browser size
        Since:
        3.0.0

        • Key: 
           galenium.screenshotOnSkipped
        • Default: 
           false
        Returns:
        whether to take and store screenshots of skipped tests for reporting

        • Default:
